item.title: rmangal `[REDIRECT]`
item.description: A very short note to mention that yesterday Steve Vissault and I published a post on rOpenSci about rmangal 🔗. In a nutshell rmangal is an R client for the Mangal database that includes > 1300 ecological networks. Check out the cool poster Steve created.
